00006 namespace ldmx {

00008     RootPersistencyMessenger::RootPersistencyMessenger(RootPersistencyManager* rootIO) :
00009             rootIO_(rootIO) {
00010 
00011         rootDir_ = new G4UIdirectory("/ldmx/persistency/root/");
00012         rootDir_->SetGuidance("ROOT persistency commands for writing events");
00013 
00014         rootFileCmd_ = new G4UIcommand("/ldmx/persistency/root/file", this);
00015         G4UIparameter* filename = new G4UIparameter("filename", 's', false);
00016         rootFileCmd_->SetParameter(filename);
00017         rootFileCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00018         rootFileCmd_->SetGuidance("Set the ROOT output file name.");
00019 
00020         verboseCmd_ = new G4UIcommand("/ldmx/persistency/root/verbose", this);
00021         G4UIparameter* verboseLevel = new G4UIparameter("verboseLevel", 'i', false);
00022         verboseCmd_->SetParameter(verboseLevel);
00023         verboseCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00024         verboseCmd_->SetGuidance("Set the ROOT IO verbose level.");
00025 
00026         disableCmd_ = new G4UIcommand("/ldmx/persistency/root/disable", this);
00027         disableCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00028         disableCmd_->SetGuidance("Disable ROOT IO.");
00029 
00030         enableCmd_ = new G4UIcommand("/ldmx/persistency/root/enable", this);
00031         enableCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00032         enableCmd_->SetGuidance("Re-enable ROOT IO after it has been disabled.");
00033 
00034         comprCmd_ = new G4UIcommand("/ldmx/persistency/root/compression", this);
00035         G4UIparameter* compLevel = new G4UIparameter("compressionLevel", 'i', false);
00036         comprCmd_->SetParameter(compLevel);
00037         comprCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00038         comprCmd_->SetGuidance("Set the output file compression level (1-9).");
00039 
00040         /*
00041          modeCmd_ = new G4UIcommand("/ldmx/persistency/root/mode", this);
00042          G4UIparameter* mode = new G4UIparameter("mode", 's', false);
00043          modeCmd_->SetParameter(mode);
00044          modeCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00045          modeCmd_->SetGuidance("Set the file mode: new update recreate");
00046          */
00047 
00048         hitContribsCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithABool("/ldmx/persistency/root/enableHitContribs", this);
00049         G4UIparameter* enable = new G4UIparameter("enable", 'b', true);
00050         hitContribsCmd_->SetParameter(enable);
00051         hitContribsCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00052         hitContribsCmd_->SetGuidance("Enable hit contributions for SimCalorimeterHits (on by default)");
00053 
00054         compressContribsCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithABool("/ldmx/persistency/root/compressHitContribs", this);
00055         G4UIparameter* compress = new G4UIparameter("enable", 'b', true);
00056         compressContribsCmd_->SetParameter(compress);
00057         compressContribsCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00058         compressContribsCmd_->SetGuidance("Compress hit contributions by matching SimParticle and PDG code");
00059     }
00060 
00061     RootPersistencyMessenger::~RootPersistencyMessenger() {
00062         delete rootFileCmd_;
00063         delete verboseCmd_;
00064         delete enableCmd_;
00065         delete disableCmd_;
00066         delete comprCmd_;
00067         //delete modeCmd_;
00068         delete rootDir_;
00069     }
00070 
00071     void RootPersistencyMessenger::SetNewValue(G4UIcommand* command, G4String newValues) {
00072 
00073         // Is ROOT IO enabled?
00074         if (RootPersistencyManager::getInstance()) {
00075             if (command == rootFileCmd_) {
00076                 rootIO_->setFileName(newValues);
00077             } else if (command == verboseCmd_) {
00078                 int verboseLevel = std::stoi(newValues);
00079                 if (verboseLevel > 4) {
00080                     verboseLevel = 4;
00081                 } else if (verboseLevel < 1) {
00082                     verboseLevel = 1;
00083                 }
00084                 rootIO_->SetVerboseLevel(verboseLevel);
00085             } else if (command == disableCmd_) {
00086                 G4PersistencyCenter::GetPersistencyCenter()->DeletePersistencyManager();
00087                 rootIO_ = nullptr;
00088             } else if (command == comprCmd_) {
00089                 int compr = std::stoi(newValues);
00090                 rootIO_->setCompressionLevel(compr);
00091             } /*else if (command == modeCmd_) {
00092              rootIO_->getWriter()->setMode(newValues);
00093              }*/else if (command == hitContribsCmd_) {
00094                 rootIO_->setEnableHitContribs(hitContribsCmd_->GetNewBoolValue(newValues.c_str()));
00095             } else if (command == compressContribsCmd_) {
00096                 rootIO_->setCompressHitContribs(compressContribsCmd_->GetNewBoolValue(newValues.c_str()));
00097             }
00098         } else {
00099             // Re-enable ROOT IO.
00100             if (command == enableCmd_) {
00101                 rootIO_ = new RootPersistencyManager();
00102             } else {
00103                 // Print a warning if user tries to send commands when IO is disabled.
00104                 std::cout << "WARNING: Command was ignored.  ROOT IO is disabled!" << std::endl;
00105             }
00106         }
00107     }
00108 
00109 } // namespace sim
